summary: Adds all skill books. There are 5 for each skill.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]All Skill Books[/b]
[/center]

Description: Adds all skill books. There are 5 for each skill. 

===== [b]Instructions:[/b] =====
DO NOT DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER. Download manually.

1. Copy the text file \"skillbooks\" to:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

or 

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

or

C:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\

depending on your version.

2. Start up Skryim
3. Load a save
4. When your character loads up: 
4a. Make sure you have spare space in your inventory
4b. Type into console (press ` / ~ key) \"bat skillbooks\" without quotes
Done :-D
author: Aypolo
